name: The Unknown City (Horror Begins Now.....Episode 1)
developer: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
publisher: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
description: The Unknown City is a First Person Shooter game series based on a Horror Theme wrapped inside a gripping story along with amazing effects with a climax that will leave the players wanting to play next episodes of this series.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later required Processor: Intel Core i3 515 7U Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB AMD or NVIDIA Graphic Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 or Later Processor: Intel Core i5 6600K Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB Nvidia GTX 970 Graphic Card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space
